meanings.definition: The production of many fruits by a plant.
meanings.sent1: The polycarpy of the apple tree amazed the gardener.
meanings.sent2: The polycarpy of the strawberry plant ensures a bountiful harvest.
meanings.sent3: The polycarpy of the grapevine kept the fruit bowl overflowing.
meanings.sent4: Her garden was a polycarpy paradise, with fruits of every color.
meanings.sent5: The polycarpy of the cherry tree made it a favorite spot for birds.

meanings.sent1: The polycarpy of the forest was a sign of its health.
meanings.sent2: In nature, polycarpy is a common trait among certain plants.
meanings.sent3: The polycarpy of the park brought joy to all who visited.
meanings.sent4: The polycarpy of the meadow symbolized abundance and growth.
meanings.sent5: The polycarpy of the garden reflected the care of its owner.
